name: CHI Angel
overview:
CHI Angels seeks to provide financial capital and mentorship to early-stage companies that advance the human experience of computing in the world.

Our group is a private investment organization composed of highly successful executives, entrepreneurs, designers, and investors. We provide a disciplined approach to angel investing.

Our goal is to help bridge the widening gap between initial start-up capital and institutional financing. We target investment opportunities ranging from $250K to $2MM with our members often syndicating with other angel or venture capital investors. We also seek opportunities where our members can add design and interaction value to help our portfolio companies achieve critical milestones.

CHI Angels also actively seeks to make contributions to the community and local charities, which includes evaluating socially conscious investment opportunities.
